codat_integration_body: Use Codat to connect to the most recent data on the companies you have access to.
integration_stage_1_description: Select the integrated data source you wish to import company data from.
integration_stage_2_description: Select the company from your integrations source list.
integration_stage_3_description: Select the sample frequency and the data period to access.
integration_stage_4_description: Add additional data to get access to a better and more accurate report.
integration_error_title: Error connecting to {integration}, please check your integration.
integration_not_valid_company: {company_name} has uncategorised accounts, please login to Codat and categorise these accounts before trying again.
integration_sampling_frequency_descripti: Choose the frequency which you want to sample the data. The sample rate is set at 5. i.e. 3 months frequency will sample a total of 15 months from the date selected.
integration_data_period_description: Choose the latest date you want to sample from. i.e. January 2022 at 3 months frequency 15 months would be the date range October 2020 - January 2022.
integration_timeframe_success:
Data for all periods is available
({total_periods} periods)
integration_timeframe_error: There are no complete periods of data available. In order to generate a report, you will need at least one period of data avaialble. If possible, please select a shorter frequency or choose a different data period to increase the range.
integration_timeframe_warning: The period will have incomplete data available ({total_periods} periods missing)
industry_sector_code_description: Add industry sector code to improve the overall accuracy of the report.
website_description: Enhance the ESG elements of the report by adding the company website.
number_of_directors_description: Add the number of directors in the company.
number_of_subsidiaries_description: Add the number of subsidiaries that the company has.

industry_sector_codes.37: Public Administration, Education, Health Social Services
